page.description: Get the value of a 32-bit word from the blob.
page.original:
.PEEKD() Syntax Double_Word_Value as N = .PEEKD( Position as N ) ArgumentDescription PositionThe position of the value to return.
Description The .PEEKD() method returns the value of an unsigned double word (32 bit) value at a Position in a blob. The first position is 1. This function returns a -1 if the position is past the end. Example b1 = file.to_blob("C:\Wallpaper\claire_081003.jpg") ? b1.peekd(10) = 16842822
See Also Blob Functions and Methods
